products.title: Chocolate Mousse
products.desc: This creamy, silky, and airy mousse. You can dress it up, as I have done above, and add other pastry components to recreate a petit gateau (a small layered mousse cake) such as the ones you see in the Paris patisseries. Or, you can keep it simple with a spoonful of soft sweetened whipped cream on top. Either way, you will be comforted in knowing that Paris is only a spoonful away.
